featured.text: Mary is a typical left-brained learner.
Recent studies indicate that the two halves of the brain—the right hemisphere and the left hemisphere — play extremely important roles in learning and communicating.
It swings from left to right to be attached to the cabinet door.
The left hemisphere deals with rules, lists of information, and short-term memory.

definition.zh_def: 左邊的，或與右邊相對的方向或位置。
definition.en_def: The direction or position that is opposite to right; also refers to the side of the body that is to the west when facing north.
definition.example: She turned left at the intersection.
